short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SEO tool to help visualize page structure titles, paragraphs and image alt. It also helps to verify the correct design of a web page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SEO Analyzer Extension for Chrome

Optimize your website's SEO effortlessly with our comprehensive SEO Analyzer Extension. This tool provides a suite of features designed to enhance your web page's performance and visibility.

Key Features:

- Display meta titles, descriptions, and icons
- Highlight titles, paragraphs, and links by default
- Show Alt text for images
- Verify if the page has an SSL certificate
- Check if the page is cached by Google
- Count titles, display average length, and Hn panel
- Highlight follow tags, external links, and backlinks indexed by Google
- Show meta words and word count in paragraphs
- Display social panel links
- Eliminate stop words and count word occurrences in paragraphs
- Open a notes panel for quick documentation
- Include GPT-3.5 or 4 Chat API key for direct interaction
- Crawl site for duplicate titles and 404 pages
- Quickly access the robots.txt page
- Trace 301 redirects and HTTP codes (similar to Firefox's Link Redirect Trace extension)
- Indicate if the page has a Canonical URL or Language HREF
- Option to disable CSS and JS for the page
- Highlight 404 errors in red
- Enhance your SEO strategy with precise insights and actionable data directly within your Chrome browser.
